body: Hi everyone, I have done a calculation of 49 different configurations (2 parameters: Openings and transmittance). What I would like to do now, is to integrate the value of the Daylight factor for each configuration. To see each configuration work. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/yIRAODsxTEyZSddVE2T1UCXCr5WlCAyocM0yH9jNitkKyDz6ZFzeNGB2ndJWVhIk-YxcT0zsnktXNkLIGK*IpQvgUTkZRB-X/ScreenShot051915at03.23PM.PNG)
topic: Integrate all my result in a tab

replies.body:
Hi Sebastien,



If I understand your question right, this example file is very close to what you are looking for: ([https://app.box.com/s/znns0dtewd1tclicx74q/1/1637772428/14467170836/1](https://app.box.com/s/znns0dtewd1tclicx74q/1/1637772428/14467170836/1))



I also cover the example in this video:
